name: Max's Multiboxing Macros
body:
### Welcome to Max's Multiboxing Macros.
This is my take on an ISBoxer configuration based on what Lax posted here:
[http://isboxer.com/wiki/HOWTO:Configure_ISBoxer_like_a_pro](http://isboxer.com/wiki/HOWTO:Configure_ISBoxer_like_a_pro)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
